Package rako_a3.ePortfolio.src

Class Portfolio

java.lang.Object
rako_a3.ePortfolio.src.Portfolio
public class Portfolio extends Object
Represents a portfolio of investments. Manages buying, selling, updating, and searching of investments. Also handles loading and saving investments to a file. Includes methods to support GUI interactions. Implements exception handling for robustness. Note: This class is designed for use with a GUI interface.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • search

      public List<Investment> search(String symbol, String keywords, Double lowPrice, Double highPrice)
      Searches for investments matching the given criteria.
      Parameters:
      symbol - The symbol to search for (can be empty).
      keywords - Keywords to search for in the name (can be empty).
      lowPrice - The lower bound of the price range (can be null).
      highPrice - The upper bound of the price range (can be null).
      Returns:
      A list of matching investments.

    • getInvestments

      public List<Investment> getInvestments()
      Returns a copy of the investments list to prevent privacy leaks.
      Returns:
      A copy of the investments list.
